channel.title: LBP Delayed for Muslims!?!?
channel.description: FUCK THEM! anyway its crazy that they get offended coz a few of the words from their stupid scroll are mentioned in music? It should be an honour that their religeon is considered in this nice way, they are wankers [URL=http://kotaku.com/5065106/nsiders-letter-to-sony-and-media-molecule-re-quran-references]Fullish Story[/URL] It makes me rage that they would get offended by such a thing, every cultural/religous group puts up with the mic being taken out of them why the fuck cant the muslims? They are sadistic bastards. Look at south park, they are always taking the piss out of catholics being pedos and the vatican dont give a fuckin hairy tit wank. /RAGE if it gets delayed for much longer

item.title: LBP Delayed for Muslims!?!?
item.dc:creator: @PeterMan PeterMan
item.description:
@PeterMan wrote:

[quote=“Gotta Catch Them All, post:22, topic:238322”][quote author=the fu superior link=topic=314592.msg2514155#msg2514155 date=1225473512]

IMO all muslims should be exterminated. This is running out of hand. Western people are afraid that muslims will retaliate when we say something bad about them. An example is the Marocan youth in the Netherlands. Mayors didn’t want to say that the problems were caused by Marocans. I say shoot the fucking sandniggers, that serves them right.

Cmon, dont tell me, if some thing was scared of you, you wouldn’t milk his fear for all its worth.
And stop being racist, you honkey, white trash, billy-bob mother fucker.
[/quote]

PAKI LOL[/quote]

Lolwut xD

item.title: LBP Delayed for Muslims!?!?
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

The guy who wrote the song is himself a muslim, there was a muslim “group” who spoke out and said sony did the right thing delaying it to make sure no one is offended but they said themself didn’t find it offensive.

But i remember the post on the official playstation forums that actually caused the delay that was pretty much demanding them to recall the game in a polite way.

They got alot of shit last year about having a gun fight in a church based in manchester on resistance, alot of bad media and with littlebigplanet they want everyone to enjoy it, its supposed to be a game for everyone so the last thing they need is bad media, but with them recalling it they avoided that and got some good media

Read full topic
